statements: SELECT * FROM recording_system_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, change_description FROM recording_system_changes WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC;
SELECT change_description FROM recording_system_changes WHERE user_id = 200 AND change_description LIKE '%update%';
SELECT * FROM recording_system_changes WHERE change_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND change_timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, count(id) AS change_count FROM recording_system_changes GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM recording_system_changes WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC
SELECT id, change_description, change_timestamp FROM recording_system_changes WHERE user_id = 456 AND change_description LIKE '%updated%'
SELECT MAX(change_timestamp) AS latest_change FROM recording_system_changes
SELECT change_description, COUNT(*) AS total_changes FROM recording_system_changes GROUP BY change_description HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT id, change_description FROM recording_system_changes WHERE user_id IN (789, 987)
SELECT id, change_description, change_timestamp FROM recording_system_changes;
SELECT change_description, id, change_timestamp FROM recording_system_changes;
SELECT change_timestamp, id, change_description FROM recording_system_changes;
SELECT * FROM recording_system_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM network_configuration_changes;
SELECT * FROM recording_system_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT change_description, change_timestamp FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, change_description FROM recording_system_changes WHERE change_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND change_timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, change_description, change_timestamp FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE change_description LIKE '%error%' AND change_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT MAX(change_timestamp), COUNT(*) AS count FROM recording_system_changes;
SELECT * FROM recording_system_changes ORDER BY change_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, change_description, user_id FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT change_time, change_description FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE device_id = 456 ORDER BY change_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, change_description FROM recording_system_changes WHERE user_id = 789;
SELECT change_time, change_description, device_id FROM audit_trail WHERE device_id = 789 ORDER BY change_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM recording_system_changes ORDER BY change_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT change_description, user_id FROM recording_system_changes WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT device_id FROM network_configuration_changes WHERE change_time > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, change_description FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 54321 AND device_id = 98765;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail JOIN network_configuration_changes ON audit_trail.device_id = network_configuration_changes.device_id;
SELECT * FROM recordings ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id, action FROM network_configuration WHERE setting = 'Firewall';
SELECT count(*) FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT table_affected, field_changed, previous_value, new_value FROM changes_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, action, table_affected FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM recordings WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM recordings WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY action DESC;
SELECT id, details->'error_message' AS error_message FROM recordings WHERE details->'error_code' = '500';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM audit_trail WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT change_id, table_affected, field_changed, previous_value, new_value FROM changes_log WHERE table_affected = 'network_configuration' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM recordings;
SELECT id, user_name, change_description FROM recordings;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT user_id, action_taken, activity_timestamp FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM recordings ORDER BY change_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT user_name, change_description FROM recordings WHERE user_name = 'John Doe' AND change_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action_taken, activity_timestamp FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT user_name, activity_description, trail_timestamp FROM audit_trails JOIN user_activities ON audit_trails.user_id = user_activities.user_id WHERE activity_description LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY trail_timestamp DESC;
